articles.description: India batter Virat Kohli will miss the rest of the Test series against England for personal reasons.
articles.title: India's Kohli to miss rest of England Test series

articles.description: It will be more than just bragging rights at stake when England and Wales renew their long-standing rivalry at Twickenham in the Six Nations on Saturday.
articles.title: Rivals England and Wales set for 'biggest game'

articles.description: The Football Association is keen for Gareth Southgate to remain as England manager beyond the 2024 Euros and through to the 2026 World Cup.
articles.title: FA keen for England boss Southgate to stay after Euros

articles.description: Who will win Super Bowl 58, how will they do it and who will be the star men? Pre-match predictions for the NFL showpiece in Las Vegas.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2024 predictions: San Francisco 49ers v Kansas City Chiefs - who will win & why?

articles.description: The hearing into charges of inappropriate and controlling behaviour against Red Bull team boss Christian Horner finishes without resolution.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Hearing into Red Bull team boss ends without resolution

articles.description: Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglu does not think proposed plans to trial blue cards for sin-binned players will "make any difference" to the game.
articles.title: Blue cards won't make a difference - Postecoglu

articles.description: Premier League chief Richard Masters says he 'did not intend' to suggest Everton and Nottingham Forest are 'small clubs'.
articles.title: PL chief Masters clarifies 'small clubs' remark

articles.description: Former New York Mets general manager Billy Eppler is suspended by Major League Baseball for violating rules governing the injured list.
articles.title: Billy Eppler: Former New York Mets general manager suspended for fabricating injuries

articles.description: Former world number one Simona Halep says she is confident of a return to tennis after her appeal against a four-year doping ban was heard by the Court of Arbitration for Sport.
articles.title: Simone Halep: Former Wimbledon champion confident of tennis return after appeal against doping ban

articles.description: Brighton agree a £16m deal to sign Ghanaian winger Ibrahim Osman from Danish side FC Nordsjalland in the summer.
articles.title: Brighton to sign Ghanaian teenager Osman for £16m
